title: Kevin Sorbo Presents The Babylon Bee's 10 Best Christians in Hollywood
description:
Being a Christian in Hollywood can be difficult - but these hardcore believers make it look easy! Today The Babylon Bee recognizes the top 10 Christians in Hollywood - and it's all presented by Kevin Sorbo.

Subscribe to our new podcast channel: https://www.youtube.com/thebabylonbeepodcast
